name: A Maze Ing
description:
A Maze Ing is a labyrinth game which has the particularity of being double. Indeed, when you start the game, there will be two sides each time with two labyrinths. The objective is to bring both cubes to their portals at the same time. To do so, it will be necessary to show intelligence and reflection by using the directional arrows. The game has 10 levels, do not hesitate to explore the menu, you can change the skin to better identify your cubes and arrival lines. the two cubes move at the same time and this is the real difficulty of the game.  Have fun and share your time in the comments. Please feel free to send feedback so that I can improve the game!

-- To break the crates, recover the nuclear object --          

Btw I'll give 5$ to the first guy who send me a screen of the game finished :D
